name: Vikalp Samajik Sanstha Samiti
briefDescription: Vikalp Samajik Sanstha-VSS is a social charitable nongovernmental organization whichdynamically involves in developmental sector through program`mme implementation andvarious filed interventions activities.The organisation is formed in the year 2004 by few qualified social work entrepreneurs whodecided at a very initial stage of their career to contribute meaningfully into society throughtheir knowledge and exposure in the developmental sector.The name VIKALP envisages (An Option) to utilize the practical experience for thebetterment of people of underprivileged section without discrimination.
